review: We could not get this on our home wireless for some reasons, so mu husband took it to school where he teachers science.  The following is his review:  "I plugged this into the HDMI port on my projector. Connected it to the faculty network and was able to screen cast from a chrome book, a mac laptop, a kindle fire, and my android phone.  (Anything that can run chrome browser with the chromecast plugin).  As a science teacher this was an excellent tool.  I can cast to the screen from anywhere in the room, or actually anywhere in the school (as long as i am on the same network).At one point during a lab, I used my kindle and the camera. When one lab group has a great "find" or reaction, I can project an image or video live to the screen for the whole class to see.  In short, this was a very effective way to teach and project power point, and other lesson info from anywhere in the class.Hardly any lag, videos worked great with sound as well.  (Occasional lag casting youtube)  You can select to cast entire screen, or single tab."
author: Holly PBW "Busy Mom"
